author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo wins five awards
text:
Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo wins five awards Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo wins five awards Details Category: Awards   11:30 Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo has announced it has received five international awards in 2015. The collections of prizes have been given to the property for its excellent service throughout the hotel and its spa. Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo has been recognised in delivering the highest degree of hospitality for its unique blend of excellence, intimacy, luxury and art of fine living. 
Located In the heart of one of the most glamorous destinations in the world, the luxurious Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo offers one of the best settings in the Principality. More than a hotel, the Metropole is Monaco’s only independent property, recognised by its guests for its intimacy and concept, surrounding famous names in design and gastronomy such as Jacques Garcia, Joël Robuchon and Karl Lagerfeld. These awards are a wonderful recognition, which highlight the work of the teams within the hotel and spa who continue to offer guests a unique and memorable experience. The awards are as follows: Best Luxury Hotel Spa – World Luxury Spa Awards Luxury Classic Hotel of the Year – Luxury Travel Guide Global Awards Monaco’s Leading Hotel – World Travel Awards Monaco’s Leading Business Hotel – World Travel Awards Monaco’s Best Hotel Spa – World Spa Awards Related articles
